task.title: Install Foundation and configure the theme
task.shortdesc: In order to develop a new theme, you need to develop a customization plugin.

context.p: In this tutorial, we will do a minimal implementation of the using the html5 plugin.

step.cmd: Download the , and extract it in the net.sourceforge.dita4publishers.html5.foundation/theme/html5-foundation/ directory
step.tutorialinfo: This directory should contains all the css and javascript your need for your project.

step.cmd: Edit the config.xml file located in the net.sourceforge.dita4publishers.html5.foundation/theme/html5-foundation/ directory. The structure allows you specify how you want the css and javascript builded for you documentation. According to the Foundation documentation, a foundation project requires only the foundation.css file and 3 scripts. The html5 plugins allows to concatenate this 3 scripts into a single file (this will reduces the number of http connections required per page).
step.stepresult: At this step, you already have processed all the required css and files for the plugin.
